Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute at Racine/Belmont

Headline: #50 Damen Temporary Reroute near Damen/Hubbard
ShortDescription: 50 Damen buses temp. rerouted NB: Damen, Washington, Western, Grand and Damen; SB: Damen, Grand, Western, Warren and Damen : near Damen/Hubbard.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Damen/Warren due to street blockage near Damen/Hubbard.

Northbound buses will operate via Damen, Washington, Western, Grand and Damen including the normal route streets.

Southbound buses will operate via Damen, Grand, Western, Warren and Damen.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #95 95th and #112 Vincennes/111th Temporary Reroute at 95th/Halsted
ShortDescription: 95 95th & 112 Vincennes/111th rrtd EB via 95th, Vincennes, 87th, Lafayette & 95th: WB via 95th, State, 87th, Vincennes & 95th due to blockage nr 95th/Halsted

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#95 95th and #112 Vincennes/111th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near 95th/Halsted.

  • Eastbound buses will operate via 95th, Vincennes, 87th, Lafayette and 95th;
  • Westbound buses will operate via 95th, State, 87th, Vincennes and 95th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #8A South Halsted Temporary Reroute at 95th/Halsted
ShortDescription: 8A South Halsted buses are rrtd via Halsted, 87th, Vincennes, 99th, then resume their normal route on Halsted due to street blockage near 95th/Halsted.
